settings.slide-des: From Gaming to Work, Perfect Gear for Every Need
settings.slide-des-mb: From Gaming to Work, Perfect Gear for Every Need

settings.text: Bring Your Dream Setup to Life with Our Products

settings.heading: The All-in-One Power Combo
settings.text: Revolutionize your workspace with modular tech designed to adapt to your every need, from gaming to professional use.

settings.heading: Mechanical Keyboard
settings.text: Modular design with customizable switches, a 3.5" HD display, and support for endless add-ons like numeric keypads and smart controllers. Perfect for gamers and creators.

settings.heading: Stream Dock
settings.text: Modular control with customizable icons, intuitive knob adjustments, and seamless integration with other devices. Streamline workflows for live streaming, design, and more.

settings.heading: Numeric Keypad
settings.text: All-aluminum shell with customizable, multifunctional keys for an enhanced workspace. Matches the feel of the Blakelyte keyboard for a seamless experience.

settings.heading: Wireless Desk Controller
settings.text: Wireless control for desk height and lighting, with long battery life and modular design for custom setups. Built to last with all-aluminum construction.

settings.heading: Superior Stain Resistance
settings.text: Combined with a stain-repellent material during formulation,Kraken’s leather comes with superior stain resistance, outperforming regular leathers by 80%. This lets you easily clean common stains like coffee spills

settings.heading: Smart Wireless Charging Mouse Pad
settings.text: Qi2 charging with dual ports, music rhythm sync, ultra-fast 65W charging, and precision gaming surface for the ultimate desk setup.

settings.heading: Wireless Mouse
settings.text: 8K polling rate, 30,000 DPI, ultra-light 55g design, and up to 100 hours of battery life. Precision, comfort, and performance for extended gaming sessions.
From intense gaming sessions to focused work, our gear adapts to enhance every aspect of your daily routine.

settings.heading: Desktop Lamp
settings.text: Dual-side lighting with customizable RGB and color temperature, music and screen sync, and magnetic base for flexible use in any setup.

settings.heading: Smart Floor Lamp
settings.text: Dynamic light effects with music sync, customizable RGB, and wireless control. Perfect for any room, with a magnetic base and included accessories.

settings.heading: Neon Rope Lights for Gaming Desks
settings.text: Customizable length with dynamic music and game sync, color modes, and multiple control options. Enhance your gaming desk with immersive lighting.

settings.heading: TV Backlight Light
settings.text: Syncs with TV or game screen, adjustable color temperature, music rhythm sync, and multiple control methods for an immersive audiovisual experience.

settings.heading: Smart Strip Light
settings.text: Flexible, customizable strip with music and screen sync, dynamic modes, and multi-control options. Elevate your space with immersive lighting effects.

settings.heading: When will these products be available for purchase?
settings.content: These products are expected to be available for purchase by mid-2025. You’ll be notified via email once they are ready for release.

settings.heading: How do I reserve a product for purchase?
settings.content: To reserve a product, simply enter your email address on the product page. By doing so, you'll be added to our list and will receive an email notification when the product becomes available.

settings.heading: Is payment required to reserve a product?
settings.content: No, payment is not required at this time. You are only reserving a spot on our notification list to be contacted when the product is available for purchase.

settings.heading: Can I cancel my reservation?
settings.content: Since no payment is taken during the reservation process, you do not need to cancel your reservation. If you decide you no longer wish to receive notifications, you can unsubscribe from our email list at any time.

settings.heading: Will there be any special offers for reservation?
settings.content: We may offer exclusive discounts or special offers to those who sign up for the pre-sale notifications. Be sure to check your email for any promotional deals when the product launches.

settings.heading: What is the estimated shipping time after the product is released?
settings.content: Once the product is available for purchase, shipping times will vary depending on your location. We will provide estimated shipping dates in your order confirmation email.
